title: Fairly heavy rainfall above 50 mm likely in some areas
byline: Showers will occur at times in the Sabaragamuwa province and in the Kandy, Nuwara-Eliya, Galle and Matara districts today (18), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: White House says Trump diagnosed with vein condition after questions about bruises
byline: Donald Trump is suffering from a chronic vein condition, the White House announced on Thursday, after days of speculation regarding photographs showing bruising on the US president’s hand.
